languages.text: Коварн{mf|ый|ая} мон-кай решает выпотрошить меня, ударив в низ живота. Я пропускаю этот удар — все важные органы уже давно были заменены более легкими и эффективными аналогами, спрятанными в неочевидных полостях тела. Я позволяю Жертве на мгновение упиться своей победой, после чего безжалостно вскрываю ей горло ударом в упор из удобной позиции.

The devious mon-keigh decides to disembowel me by striking at my lower abdomen. I let the blow come through: all the vital organs have long since been replaced by lighter and more efficient counterparts hidden in unobtrusive body cavities. I let the Prey revel in its victory for a brief moment and then callously slit its throat with a swift strike from an advantageous angle.
languages.original_text: Коварн{mf|ый|ая} мон-кай решает выпотрошить меня, ударив в низ живота. Я пропускаю этот удар — все важные органы уже давно были заменены более легкими и эффективными аналогами, спрятанными в неочевидных полостях тела. Я позволяю Жертве на мгновение упиться своей победой, после чего безжалостно вскрываю ей горло ударом в упор из удобной позиции.

traits.locale_text: The insidious mon-keigh decides to disembowel me by striking at my lower abdomen. I let the blow come through — all the important organs have long since been replaced by lighter and more efficient counterparts hidden in unobvious body cavities. I let the Prey revel in his victory for a brief moment and then callously slit its throat with a swift strike from a position of comfort.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 卑怯なモン＝ケイは、私の下腹部を殴って内臓を取り出そうとした。重要な臓器はすべて、目立たない体腔に隠されたより軽量で効率的な臓器に、とうの昔に取り換えられていた。私はしばらくの間、獲物に勝利の喜びを味わわせ、有利な角度からの素早い一撃で無慈悲にもその喉を切り裂いた。
languages.original_text: The devious mon-keigh decides to disembowel me by striking at my lower abdomen. I let the blow come through: all the vital organs have long since been replaced by lighter and more efficient counterparts hidden in unobtrusive body cavities. I let the Prey revel in its victory for a brief moment and then callously slit its throat with a swift strike from an advantageous angle.

traits.locale_text: 卑怯なモン＝ケイは、私の下腹部を殴って内臓を取り出そうとした。重要な臓器はすべて、目立たない体腔に隠されたより軽量で効率的な臓器に、とうの昔に取り換えられていた。私はしばらくの間、獲物に勝利の喜びを味わわせ、有利な角度からの素早い一撃で無慈悲にもその喉を切り裂いた。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 那只阴险的猴子打算攻击我的小腹，将我开膛破肚。但它不知道的是，我所有重要的器官都已经被换掉了，换成了更轻、更高效的器官，藏在身体不起眼的体腔内。我让猎物在胜利中陶醉片刻，随后以有利的角度猛地一击，轻而易举地割断了它的喉咙。
languages.original_text: The devious mon-keigh decides to disembowel me by striking at my lower abdomen. I let the blow come through: all the vital organs have long since been replaced by lighter and more efficient counterparts hidden in unobtrusive body cavities. I let the Prey revel in its victory for a brief moment and then callously slit its throat with a swift strike from an advantageous angle.

traits.locale_text: 那只阴险的猴子打算攻击我的小腹，将我开膛破肚。但它不知道的是，我所有重要的器官都已经被换掉了，换成了更轻、更高效的器官，藏在身体不起眼的体腔内。我让猎物在胜利中陶醉片刻，随后以有利的角度猛地一击，轻而易举地割断了它的喉咙。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: {mf|El astuto|La astuta} mon-keigh decide destriparme con un golpe en el bajo vientre. Dejo que el impacto me alcance: hace mucho que todos mis órganos vitales fueron sustituidos por piezas más ligeras y eficientes ocultas discretamente en distintas cavidades corporales. Dejo que la presa se regodee en su victoria durante un breve instante y luego le corto cruelmente la garganta con un golpe veloz desde un buen ángulo.
languages.original_text: The devious mon-keigh decides to disembowel me by striking at my lower abdomen. I let the blow come through: all the vital organs have long since been replaced by lighter and more efficient counterparts hidden in unobtrusive body cavities. I let the Prey revel in its victory for a brief moment and then callously slit its throat with a swift strike from an advantageous angle.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El insidioso|La insidiosa} mon-keigh decide destriparme con un golpe en el bajo vientre. Dejo que el impacto me alcance: hace mucho que todos mis órganos vitales fueron sustituidos por piezas más ligeras y eficientes ocultas discretamente en distintas cavidades corporales. Dejo que la presa se regodee en su victoria durante un breve instante y luego le corto cruelmente la garganta con un golpe veloz desde un buen ángulo.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Der teuflische Chem-Pan-Sey beschließt, mich auszuweiden, indem er meinen Bauch attackiert. Ich lasse den Schlag geschehen. Alle lebenswichtigen Organe wurden durch leichtere, effizientere Verbesserungen ersetzt, die in geschickt platzierten Körperhöhlen verborgen liegen. Ich lasse die Beute einen kurzen Augenblick lang ihren Sieg genießen, dann schlitze ich ihr aus einem vorteilhaften Winkel mit einem schnellen Schnitt heimtückisch die Kehle auf.
languages.original_text: The devious mon-keigh decides to disembowel me by striking at my lower abdomen. I let the blow come through: all the vital organs have long since been replaced by lighter and more efficient counterparts hidden in unobtrusive body cavities. I let the Prey revel in its victory for a brief moment and then callously slit its throat with a swift strike from an advantageous angle.

traits.locale_text: Der schändliche Chem-Pan-Sey beschließt, mich auszuweiden, indem er meinen Bauch attackiert. Ich lasse den Schlag geschehen. Alle lebenswichtigen Organe wurden durch leichtere, effizientere Verbesserungen ersetzt, die in geschickt platzierten Körperhöhlen verborgen liegen. Ich lasse die Beute einen kurzen Augenblick lang ihren Sieg genießen, dann schlitze ich ihr aus einem vorteilhaften Winkel mit einem schnellen Schnitt heimtückisch die Kehle auf.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Dans une vile tentative de m'éviscérer, {mf|le|la} mon-keigh me frappe à l'abdomen. Je ne réagis pas : tous mes organes vitaux ont depuis longtemps été remplacés par des éléments plus légers et plus efficaces, dissimulés dans des cavités corporelles discrètes. Je laisse la proie savourer sa victoire un court instant avant de lui trancher la gorge d'un geste fluide.
languages.original_text: The devious mon-keigh decides to disembowel me by striking at my lower abdomen. I let the blow come through: all the vital organs have long since been replaced by lighter and more efficient counterparts hidden in unobtrusive body cavities. I let the Prey revel in its victory for a brief moment and then callously slit its throat with a swift strike from an advantageous angle.

traits.locale_text: Dans une tentative de m'éviscérer, {mf|le|la} mon-keigh me frappe à l'abdomen. Je ne réagis pas : tous mes organes vitaux ont depuis longtemps été remplacés par des éléments plus légers et plus efficaces, dissimulés dans des cavités corporelles discrètes. Je laisse la proie savourer sa victoire un court instant avant de lui trancher la gorge d'un geste fluide.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Hilekâr mon-keigh, alt karın bölgeme saldırarak karnımı deşmeye karar veriyor. Darbeyi vurmasına izin veriyorum. Tüm hayati organlarım, uzun zaman önce daha hafif ve daha efektif alternatifleriyle değiştirilip bedenin içindeki boşluklardaki dikkat çekmeyen yerlere gizlendi. Avım, kısa bir süreliğine zafer sevinci yaşarken avantajlı bir açıdan, net bir hamleyle, duyarsızca boğazını kesiyorum.
languages.original_text: The devious mon-keigh decides to disembowel me by striking at my lower abdomen. I let the blow come through: all the vital organs have long since been replaced by lighter and more efficient counterparts hidden in unobtrusive body cavities. I let the Prey revel in its victory for a brief moment and then callously slit its throat with a swift strike from an advantageous angle.

traits.locale_text: Hilekâr mon-keigh, alt karın bölgeme saldırarak karnımı deşmeye karar veriyor. Darbenin gelmesine izin veriyorum: Tüm hayati organlar uzun zaman önce daha hafif ve daha efektif alternatifleriyle değiştirildi ve bedenin içindeki boşluklardaki dikkat çekmeyen yerlere gizlendi. Av'ın kısa bir süreliğine zafer sevinci yaşamasına izin veriyorum ve ardından avantajlı bir açıdan, net bir hamleyle, duyarsızca boğazını kesiyorum.
traits.speaker: Player
